actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported to Senate by Senator Chafee without amendment. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 127.
Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

official_title: A bill to designate the United States courthouse under construction at the corner of Las Vegas Boulevard and Clark Avenue in Las Vegas, Nevada, as the "Lloyd D. George United States Courthouse".

summary.text: Designates the U.S. courthouse under construction at the corner of Las Vegas Boulevard and Clark Avenue, in Las Vegas, Nevada, as the Lloyd D. George United States Courthouse.

titles.title: A bill to designate the United States courthouse under construction at the corner of Las Vegas Boulevard and Clark Avenue in Las Vegas, Nevada, as the "Lloyd D. George United States Courthouse".
